translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽In accordance with the True Idea, and the opposite of that, and the triplets beginning with “with object”

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.38. Sārammaṇaduka, Kusalattika🔽Sārammaṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Sārammaṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  sa ārammaṇa duka kusala ttika  sa ārammaṇam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa ārammaṇaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  sa ārammaṇam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa ārammaṇaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With object, wholesome, and the triplets beginning with “wholesome”🔽With object, a wholesome consciousness element arises with a wholesome object as condition. With cause as condition, one … With outflows as condition, one …🔽With object, an unwholesome consciousness element arises with an unwholesome object as condition. With cause as condition, one … With outflows as condition, one …

original: Anārammaṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naanārammaṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: anārammaṇam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na anārammaṇaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With object, an indeterminate consciousness element arises with an indeterminate object as condition. With cause as condition, one … With outflows as condition, one …
